sentences.en: A cut on his cheek was still oozing blood.
sentences.cn: 他脸上的伤口还在渗血。

sentences.en: Because old bittern answers ooze , already affected plant area and the environment select an area.
sentences.cn: 由于老卤回渗, 已影响到厂区和采区的环境.

sentences.en: Drip or ooze systems are common for pot watering.
sentences.cn: 滴灌和渗灌系统一般也用于盆栽灌水.

sentences.en: Elegant and delicate soak and ooze the and carefree heart outline a picture of ultimate romance.
sentences.cn: 高贵典雅,浸沁悠憩的心灵,勾勒无限浪漫风情.

sentences.en: He grabbed into the ooze and came up clutching a large toad.
sentences.cn: 他把手伸进淤泥里捞摸，结果抓上来一只巨大的蟾蜍。

sentences.en: He stepped forward, hit foot sand into the ooze.
sentences.cn: 他向前一迈步, 脚陷进了淤泥之中.

sentences.en: I love the warm sensation as they ooze between my toes.
sentences.cn: 当虫子小小的躯体在我脚趾间被挤爆时,我喜欢那种温暖的感觉.

sentences.en: In parts it is a slick black ooze, fit only for scores of bathing water buffalo.
sentences.cn: 有些地方是光滑的黑色的淤泥, 仅仅适合于水牛洗澡.

sentences.en: Ooze with self belief and others too will believe in you.
sentences.cn: 展示出你的自信,他人也会因此而相信你.

sentences.en: Soon layer of oceanic ooze began to accumulate above the old hard layer.
sentences.cn: 不久后海洋软泥层开始在老的硬地层上堆积.

sentences.en: The lava will just ooze gently out of the crater.
sentences.cn: 岩浆就会从火山口缓缓涌流出来。

sentences.en: The ooze water of these various types belongs to low metamorphic water.
sentences.cn: 这些不同类型的软泥水均属软泥阶段的浅变质水.

sentences.en: The wounds may heal cleanly or they may ooze a clear liquid.
sentences.cn: 这些伤口可能会利索地愈合，也可能会分泌出一种透明的液体。

sentences.en: They are good for your Golden Retriever because they ooze nutrition.
sentences.cn: 这样对金毛有好处因为他们有营养.

sentences.en: Tiberium Trooper - This will give you a green tiberium ooze dispenser that is good against mainly infantry.
sentences.cn: 泰矿步兵 ― ―这将提供给你一台绿色泰矿喷射器,可以抵抗大多数的步兵单位.

trans.tran_cn: 软泥，渗出物，鞣皮用的浸液
trans.tran_en: very soft mud, especially at the bottom of a lake or sea

trans.tran_cn: 慢慢地流， 渗出； 逐渐消失
trans.tran_en: if a thick liquid oozes from something or if something oozes a thick liquid, that liquid flows from it very slowly

trans.tran_cn: 渗出，慢慢地消失或减退，慢而稳地进步，出众
使液体缓缓流出，（秘密等）泄漏，溜走，充分地表露或散发
